title: Fishcakes and creamy peas
description: Fishcakes are so easy to make and a great way to get kids to eat fish. Any white fish would work well in this recipe, just take care to bone it thoroughly. This is designed to be a low cost recipe.
ingredients: 360g/12oz frozen white fish fillets (such as Coley or Pollock), defrosted, skin and bones removed
150g/5½oz breadcrumbs (made from 4-5 slices of bread, broken into breadcrumbs and dried slightly)
